subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The free-agent slugger Manny Ramírez rejected a third offer from the Los Angeles Dodgers. The latest deal, one year for $25 million, would have made Ramírez baseball’s second-highest paid player, after Alex Rodriguez. The Dodgers said there was no deadline on the negotiations. ¶A group led by the former agent Jeff Moorad has reached an agreement to buy the San Diego Padres from the majority owner John Moores, pending approval of league owners. Moorad resigned last month as the chief executive of the Arizona Diamondbacks. padres.
